Detailed Description

List of bank/program/pitches used in a set of songs.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 2007 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL

Typedef Documentation

typedef void SPMIDI_ProgramList

Opaque type for a list of programs used in a song.

Function Documentation

int MIDIFile_ScanForPrograms ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
unsigned char *  image,
int  numBytes 
)

Analyse a MIDI file and mark each program and drum used in the song.

This can be run on multiple files and the results will accumulate.

Parameters:
image Pointer to an in memory copy of a MIDI file.
numBytes Size of an in memory copy of a MIDI file.

int SPMIDI_ClearDrumUsed ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
int  bank,
int  program,
int  noteIndex

int  bank,
int  program 
)

int SPMIDI_CreateProgramList ( SPMIDI_ProgramList **  programListPtr  ) 

Allocate a list that can be used to keep track of bank and program combinations used in a song.

It can also track drums used by bank, program and pitch.

Parameters:
Variable to receive a pointer to the SPMIDI_ProgramList structure.

void SPMIDI_DeleteProgramList ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList  ) 

int SPMIDI_IsDrumUsed ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
int  bank,
int  program,

int SPMIDI_IsProgramUsed ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
int  bank,
int  program 
)

Returns:
TRUE if the bank and program is "used".

Parameters:
program MIDI program number from 0 to 127.

SPMIDI_Error SPMIDI_LoadOrchestra ( StreamIO *  instrumentStream,
SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
SPMIDI_Orchestra **  orchestraPtr 
)

Load a set of instruments from an MBIS file.

An MBIS file is exported from the Mobileer Editor. When you are done using the Orchestra you should delete it using SPMIDI_DeleteOrchestra().

Parameters:
programList An optional list of programs and drums to load from the MBIS file. Set to NULL to load everything.
orchestraPtr Variable to receive a pointer to the loaded orchestra.

int SPMIDI_SetDrumUsed ( SPMIDI_ProgramList *  programList,
int  bank,
int  program,
int  noteIndex 
)

Mark a bank, program and noteIndex combination for a drum instrument as "in use".

Parameters:
program MIDI program number from 0 to 127.

int  program
